text: d "go to work" routines are suppressed. Also α 6 ← 1, re- ducing the mobility amplitude of all A 1 even the homeless, as dis- cussed in Section 3.3.1. The lockdown is unconditional, meaning that from t=0 to T, all the restrictions are applied. This scenario is highly conservative in healthcare terms, and the main goal is to save as many lives as possible by minimizing viral spreading. In the impossibility
